mapper.select: select p.palette_seq, t.txt_seq, p.palette_color1, p.palette_color2, p.palette_color3, p.palette_color4, p.palette_color5, p.regdit_date, p.user_seq from inputtext t, palettes p where t.txt_seq = p.txt_seq order by rand() limit 16

select p.palette_seq, t.txt_seq, p.palette_color1, p.palette_color2, p.palette_color3, p.palette_color4, p.palette_color5, p.regdit_date, p.user_seq from inputtext t, palettes p where t.txt_seq = p.txt_seq order by jaro_winkler_similarity(#{inputText}, t.txt_content) desc limit 16
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userPalettes (palette_name, palette_color1, palette_color2, palette_color3, palette_color4, palette_color5, regdit_date, user_seq) VALUES (#{palette_name}, #{palette_color1}, #{palette_color2}, #{palette_color3}, #{palette_color4}, #{palette_color5}, #{regdit_date}, #{user_seq},);
